Dropdown

View component on Github This page on Github
Example
Item Item 2 Item 3 

<div x-data="dropdown">
  <button
    x-bind="trigger"
    class="mx-auto block flex items-center rounded-md border-violet-700 bg-violet-500 px-4 py-2 font-medium text-gray-100 hover:bg-violet-600 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:bg-violet-500 dark:hover:bg-violet-600"
  >
    Dropdown menu
    <svg
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      fill="currentColor"
      viewBox="0 0 512 512"
      class="ml-2 h-4 w-4 rotate-180 transform duration-200"
      :class="{ '!rotate-0': isOpen }"
    >
      <path
        d="M233.4 105.4c12.5-12.5 32.8-12.5 45.3 0l192 192c12.5 12.5 12.5 32.8 0 45.3s-32.8 12.5-45.3 0L256 173.3 86.6 342.6c-12.5 12.5-32.8 12.5-45.3 0s-12.5-32.8 0-45.3l192-192z"
      />
    </svg>
  </button>
  <div
    x-bind="menu"
    x-cloak
    x-alt-transition='
      {
        "enter": ["opacity-0 scale-y-50", "transition ease-out duration-100 origin-top", "opacity-100"],
        "leave": ["opacity-100", "transition ease-in duration-100 origin-top", "opacity-0 scale-y-50"]
      }
    '
    class="z-50 w-[320px] rounded-md border border-secondary-200 bg-white shadow-md dark:border-dark-700 dark:bg-dark-800 dark:text-text-300"
  >
    <a
      href="#"
      class="my-1 block w-full px-6 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-text-800 hover:bg-secondary-100 focus:bg-primary-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-text-300 dark:hover:bg-dark-700 dark:focus:bg-primary-500 dark:focus:text-white"
    >
      Item
    </a>
    <a
      href="#"
      class="my-1 block w-full px-6 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-text-800 hover:bg-secondary-100 focus:bg-primary-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-text-300 dark:hover:bg-dark-700 dark:focus:bg-primary-500 dark:focus:text-white"
    >
      Item 2
    </a>
    <a
      href="#"
      class="my-1 block w-full px-6 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-text-800 hover:bg-secondary-100 focus:bg-primary-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-text-300 dark:hover:bg-dark-700 dark:focus:bg-primary-500 dark:focus:text-white"
    >
      Item 3
    </a>
  </div>
</div>

Usage

<script defer src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/litewind-alpine@0.x.x/plugins/use-floating/dist/cdn.min.js"></script>
<script defer src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/litewind-alpine@0.x.x/components/dropdown/dist/cdn.min.js"></script>

The data for the component is provided by the dropdown function in the x-data directive and the props in the data-* attributes. The dropdown also requires use-floating plugin that uses FloatingUI to calculate and update position of the menu.

Props

data-trigger-event
click String

Event that triggers dropdown. Valid values are click or hover.

data-auto-close
true Boolean

If true menu is closed after clicking on any element inside.

data-placement
bottom-start String

Initial placement of dropdown content. FloatingUI option, see documentation for examples and usage.

data-offset-x
0 Number

Offset of dropdown relative to reference element. FloatingUI option, see documentation for examples and usage.

data-offset-y
0 Number

Offset of dropdown relative to reference element. FloatingUI option, see documentation for examples and usage.

data-flip
false Boolean

Allows fliping of the dropdown to the opposite placement if outside of current view. FloatingUI option, see documentation for examples and usage.

data-auto-placement
false Boolean

Automatically calculates best placement for the floating element. FloatingUI option, see documentation for examples and usage.

data-inline
false Boolean

Improves positioning for inline reference elements that span over multiple lines. FloatingUI option, see documentation for examples and usage.

data-role
empty string String

The dropdown is a generic component that can be used for all kinds of applications. If you are building something more well defined like a menu or listbox you can use this prop to automatically add aria attributes to the elements. Valid values are: menu, listbox and dialog. By default, if this prop is not set, only ARIA attributes for expanding content are included.

Dropdown on hover

To make dropdown menu open on hover set the data-trigger-event to 'hover'. In hover mode there is short delay before closing menu when the mouse leaves the trigger element.

Example
Item Item 2 Item 3 

<div x-data="dropdown" data-trigger-event="hover">
  <button
    x-bind="trigger"
    class="mx-auto block flex items-center rounded-md border-violet-700 bg-violet-500 px-4 py-2 font-medium text-gray-100 hover:bg-violet-600 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:bg-violet-500 dark:hover:bg-violet-600"
  >
    Dropdown menu
    <svg
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      fill="currentColor"
      viewBox="0 0 512 512"
      class="ml-2 h-4 w-4 rotate-180 transform duration-200"
      :class="{ '!rotate-0': isOpen }"
    >
      <path
        d="M233.4 105.4c12.5-12.5 32.8-12.5 45.3 0l192 192c12.5 12.5 12.5 32.8 0 45.3s-32.8 12.5-45.3 0L256 173.3 86.6 342.6c-12.5 12.5-32.8 12.5-45.3 0s-12.5-32.8 0-45.3l192-192z"
      />
    </svg>
  </button>
  <div
    x-bind="menu"
    x-cloak
    x-alt-transition='
      {
        "enter": ["opacity-0 scale-y-50", "transition ease-out duration-100 origin-top", "opacity-100"],
        "leave": ["opacity-100", "transition ease-in duration-100 origin-top", "opacity-0 scale-y-50"]
      }
    '
    class="z-50 w-[320px] rounded-md border border-secondary-200 bg-white shadow-md dark:border-dark-700 dark:bg-dark-800 dark:text-text-300"
  >
    <a
      href="#"
      class="my-1 block w-full px-6 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-text-800 hover:bg-secondary-100 focus:bg-primary-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-text-300 dark:hover:bg-dark-700 dark:focus:bg-primary-500 dark:focus:text-white"
    >
      Item
    </a>
    <a
      href="#"
      class="my-1 block w-full px-6 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-text-800 hover:bg-secondary-100 focus:bg-primary-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-text-300 dark:hover:bg-dark-700 dark:focus:bg-primary-500 dark:focus:text-white"
    >
      Item 2
    </a>
    <a
      href="#"
      class="my-1 block w-full px-6 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-text-800 hover:bg-secondary-100 focus:bg-primary-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-text-300 dark:hover:bg-dark-700 dark:focus:bg-primary-500 dark:focus:text-white"
    >
      Item 3
    </a>
  </div>
</div>

Dropdown menu

Dropdown is a generic component that can contain any kind of content. To build standard menu add data-role="menu" prop and x-bind="menuItem" to the menu item elements. These will set required ARIA attributes and enable keyboard navigation.

Example
Menu item Menu item
Menu item Menu item
Header
Menu item Menu item 

<div x-data="dropdown" data-role="menu">
  <button
    x-bind="trigger"
    class="mx-auto block flex items-center rounded-md border-violet-700 bg-violet-500 px-4 py-2 font-medium text-gray-100 hover:bg-violet-600 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:bg-violet-500 dark:hover:bg-violet-600"
  >
    Dropdown menu
    <svg
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      fill="currentColor"
      viewBox="0 0 512 512"
      class="ml-2 h-4 w-4 rotate-180 transform duration-200"
      :class="{ '!rotate-0': isOpen }"
    >
      <path
        d="M233.4 105.4c12.5-12.5 32.8-12.5 45.3 0l192 192c12.5 12.5 12.5 32.8 0 45.3s-32.8 12.5-45.3 0L256 173.3 86.6 342.6c-12.5 12.5-32.8 12.5-45.3 0s-12.5-32.8 0-45.3l192-192z"
      />
    </svg>
  </button>
  <div
    x-bind="menu"
    x-cloak
    x-alt-transition='
      {
        "enter": ["opacity-0 scale-y-50", "transition ease-out duration-100 origin-top", "opacity-100"],
        "leave": ["opacity-100", "transition ease-in duration-100 origin-top", "opacity-0 scale-y-50"]
      }
    '
    class="z-50 w-[320px] rounded-md border border-secondary-200 bg-white py-1 shadow-md dark:border-dark-700 dark:bg-dark-800 dark:text-text-300"
  >
    <a
      x-bind="menuItem"
      href="#"
      class="block flex w-full items-center gap-x-2 px-3 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-text-800 hover:bg-secondary-100 focus:bg-primary-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-text-300 dark:hover:bg-dark-700 dark:focus:bg-primary-500 dark:focus:text-white"
    >
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 16 16">
        <path d="M12.854.146a.5.5 0 0 0-.707 0L10.5 1.793 14.207 5.5l1.647-1.646a.5.5 0 0 0 0-.708zm.646 6.061L9.793 2.5 3.293 9H3.5a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5v.5h.5a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5v.5h.5a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5v.5h.5a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5v.207zm-7.468 7.468A.5.5 0 0 1 6 13.5V13h-.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.5-.5V12h-.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.5-.5V11h-.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.5-.5V10h-.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.175-.032l-.179.178a.5.5 0 0 0-.11.168l-2 5a.5.5 0 0 0 .65.65l5-2a.5.5 0 0 0 .168-.11z"/>
      </svg>
      Menu item
    </a>
    <a
      x-bind="menuItem"
      href="#"
      class="block flex w-full items-center gap-x-2 px-3 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-text-800 hover:bg-secondary-100 focus:bg-primary-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-text-300 dark:hover:bg-dark-700 dark:focus:bg-primary-500 dark:focus:text-white"
    >
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 16 16">
        <path d="M12.854.146a.5.5 0 0 0-.707 0L10.5 1.793 14.207 5.5l1.647-1.646a.5.5 0 0 0 0-.708zm.646 6.061L9.793 2.5 3.293 9H3.5a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5v.5h.5a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5v.5h.5a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5v.5h.5a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5v.207zm-7.468 7.468A.5.5 0 0 1 6 13.5V13h-.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.5-.5V12h-.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.5-.5V11h-.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.5-.5V10h-.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.175-.032l-.179.178a.5.5 0 0 0-.11.168l-2 5a.5.5 0 0 0 .65.65l5-2a.5.5 0 0 0 .168-.11z"/>
      </svg>
      Menu item
    </a>
    <hr class="my-1 dark:border-dark-600">
    <a
      x-bind="menuItem"
      href="#"
      class="block flex w-full items-center gap-x-2 px-3 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-text-800 hover:bg-secondary-100 focus:bg-primary-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-text-300 dark:hover:bg-dark-700 dark:focus:bg-primary-500 dark:focus:text-white"
    >
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 16 16">
        <path d="M12.854.146a.5.5 0 0 0-.707 0L10.5 1.793 14.207 5.5l1.647-1.646a.5.5 0 0 0 0-.708zm.646 6.061L9.793 2.5 3.293 9H3.5a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5v.5h.5a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5v.5h.5a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5v.5h.5a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5v.207zm-7.468 7.468A.5.5 0 0 1 6 13.5V13h-.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.5-.5V12h-.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.5-.5V11h-.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.5-.5V10h-.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.175-.032l-.179.178a.5.5 0 0 0-.11.168l-2 5a.5.5 0 0 0 .65.65l5-2a.5.5 0 0 0 .168-.11z"/>
